DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , two period crossover study evaluate effect multiple dos activate charcoal pharmacokinetics single oral dose RO4995819 healthy volunteer . Each enrol subject receive two single oral dos RO4995819 separate wash-out period 9 week . In period 1 , subject receive concomitantly single dose RO4995819 multiple oral dos activate charcoal Day 7 . In period 2 , single dose RO4995819 activate charcoal administer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study The Effect Multiple Doses Activated Charcoal The Pharmacokinetics Single Dose RO4995819
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject , 18 65 year age , inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 inclusive All subject must agree use barrier method ( e.g . condom ) throughout study 5 month last dose study drug Significant past present disorder central nervous system , psychiatric disorder behavioral disturbance . Any suspicion history alcohol abuse and/or consumption drug abuse Positive hepatitis B , hepatitis C , HIV 1 HIV 2 Participation investigational drug device study within 3 month prior first administration study drug Any confirm allergic reaction drug multiple allergy Dietary restriction would prohibit consumption standardize meal Positive cotinine test and/or use nicotine containing product Clinically relevant history constipation bowel disorder Known intolerability activate charcoal
